review: So far I'm loving this product,  it's easy to use and works pretty well even when my Internet connection is going a little slow.that being said I can't compare it to other products like because I haven't tried others. I was previously using my Wii to stream my amazon content. All I can tell you is that this works better, the battaries in the remote will last longer and it's cheaper than a gaming system so in that comparison this product is better.
